wikipedia_page.main:
Vicky Jewson (born 18 September 1985) is an English screenwriter, producer and film director.
Jewson was born in Oxford, where she still lives. She became interested in making films as a child, and took a five-day course with the Oxford Film and Video Makers at the age of 16.

response: She has previously acted the role of Lady Godiva in an independent film based on a script by Vicky Jewson.
|Lady Godiva||Vicky Jewson||Phoebe Thomas, Matthew Chambers, Natalie Walter||Romance/comedy||

Lady Godiva is a 2008 British romantic comedy film written and directed by Vicky Jewson. The film, starring Phoebe Thomas, Matthew Chambers, and Natalie Walter, was shot in 2006 but went unreleased for two years. Based on the historic tale of Lady Godiva, it was set in modern-day Oxford.
A Phenom 300 operated by FlairJet was featured in the 2014 film 'Born of War',IMDB - Born of War written and directed by Vicky Jewson and starring James Frain, Sofia Black-D'Elia and Michael Brandon.
| Written and directed by Vicky Jewson and starring Noomi Rapace as the bodyguard of Nélisse's character, a rich young Bangkok heiress.
* Vicky Jewson (born 1985), English screenwriter and film director

Close is a 2019 action thriller film directed by Vicky Jewson and starring Noomi Rapace. Rapace's character is based on that of Jacquie Davis, one of the world's leading female bodyguards, whose clients have included J. K. Rowling, Nicole Kidman and members of the British royal family.-  The film was released on 18 January 2019 by Netflix.
|| Director: Vicky Jewson  Cast: Noomi Rapace, Sophie Nélisse, Eoin Macken, Indira Varma, Mimi Keene
